alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 8:23PM EST until January 11 at 9:35AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Portions of south central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following areas, in south central Kentucky, Laurel, Pulaski and Rockcastle. In southeast Kentucky, Clay, Jackson and Owsley. * WHEN...Until midnight EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 819 PM EST, ongoing flooding issues were being reported. Several roads remain inundated. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Somerset, London, Mount Vernon, Manchester, McKee, Booneville, East Bernstadt, and Sand Hill.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
